name: Best Beer Cheese Soup
author: Michelle Pope Matthews
summary: This delicious blend of cheese, bacon, onion, basil and more is easy to make and well worth the effort.
ingredients: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles domestic beer
½ pound sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown; drain on plate lined with paper towels; crumble
Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat
Cook the onion, carrot, and celery in the butter until soft, 7 to 10 minutes
Add the bacon, basil, oregano, and green onions; cook and stir 2 minutes
Stir the flour into the mixture until completely dissolved
Pour in the chicken broth and beer; cook until heated through
Melt the processed cheese food and Cheddar cheese in the mixture in small batches
Season with garlic powder and stir
